title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Buffalo Soldier NPS Photo   Â    Nicodemus Kansas sits in the heart of America's bread basket. Watch the video National Park Has Amazing Food Community on YouTube.  In the 1860s, six all-black cavalry regiments were created to help rebuild the country following the Civil War. Learn more StoryCorps "Celebrating Black History with the National Park Service." Scroll down the page and watch the video Nicodemus National Historic site or click here to watch the video. Black Town in Kansas? Poem Explains Epic Story. More. The promise of freedom sustained those who came to Nicodemus, Kansas. Watch poet Sunni Patterson perform the poem "O Nicodemus." The settlers of Nicodemus laid down brick and mortar, hand crafting a community brimming with new opportunity. To learn more and to watch the video They Built Their Own Town / The Nicodemus Story. click here.
